original_text: And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until he had finished all the house: also the whole altar that was by the oracle he overlaid with gold.
korean_text: 온 성전을 금으로 입히기를 마치고 내소에 속한 제단의 전부를 금으로 입혔더라

sentences.original_text: And the whole house he overlaid with gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 집을 그는 금으로 입혔으며

sentences.original_text: until he had finished all the house
also the whole altar that was by the oracle
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 신탁 가까이 있던 온 제단도
